# π

> The mathematical constant [π][pi].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var PI = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-pi' );
```

#### PI

The mathematical constant [π][pi].

```javascript
var bool = ( PI === 3.141592653589793 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
